about_the_game:
Fantasy Field and Dungeon BGM features beautifully orchestrated music perfect as background score that doesnt get in the way. Drifting, ambient, evolving, lush, sometimes sinister soundscapes suitable for fields, dungeons, any scenes where non-intrusive and subtle music is required.

Features:

* 14 vast, orchestrated royalty-free songs + 2 Bonus tracks
* ogg, mp3, m4a and wav formats included
* for use in RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

1 - Savage beauty
2 - Distant Horizon
3 - Beautiful Meadows
4 - Sea and Sky
5 - Throne of Lost Kings
6 - Winds on the Plains
7 - The Farewell
8 - Bottomless Hole
9 - Dark Lonely Depths
10 - Forest Journey
11 - Depths of Dread
12 - Pastoral Valley
13 - Desert of Lost Dreams
14 - The Fallen

Bonus Tracks:

Age of Ice
Enigmatic

* Bonus tracks are from the album Aetherium Divine by Murray Atkinson and are subject to Youtube Content ID.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
